DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Autologous Graft Use Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator for information related to the use of an autologous graft in breast reconstruction surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Autologous Graft Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy._Taken from an individual's own tissues, cells, or DNA._Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
